caseTitle: Cantonment Board Peshawar & another v. M/S Raco Advertiser & another
tagline: Discussion: (1) Clause of Arbitration Agreement for dispute resolution. (2) Section 16, 19, 30, 32, 33 & 35 of the Arbitration Act 1940. (3) Article 4 of the Constitution. (4) Latin phrase “lex terrae” & “legem terrae”. (5) Expression remedium juris (6) Sections 260 to 265 of the Cantonments Act, 1924.
